name: Backup Video call working now, Voice room completed, 11 PM/ 25 September- 4nd Backup voice post- Voicebook-Room voice Done- befor Story, Audio and video call completed
description: A fully voice-controlled social media application where you can sign up, log in, navigate your feed, post audio, comment, and more, all using your voice. This implementation simulates the voice experience through a text-based command interface powered by the Gemini API.
